channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 8BitDo’s latest wireless controllers can now shake-to-wake the Switch 2
item.description: Third-party controller makers that have figured out how to wirelessly wake the Switch 2 from its standby mode are generally loud and proud about that feature. That’s because there still aren’t many controllers that can mimic one of the $89.99 Switch 2 Pro’s biggest selling points, which is letting owners turn the console on from […]

item.title: The Pixel 10 Family Is Marked Down on Amazon
item.description: You can snag a discount on all the Pixel 10 phone varieties if you act fast.

item.title: The Story Behind the Funniest ‘Indiana Jones’ Prop Replica You’ve Ever Seen
item.description: Idols? Whips? Fedora? No way. Regal Robot has made an iconic 'Indiana Jones' clothes hanger.

item.title: Pinterest CEO touts open source AI: ‘tremendous performance’ with reduced costs
item.description: Pinterest CEO Bill Ready says open source AI is offering cost savings to the company, particularly in visual search.

item.title: Meet the Chinese Startup Using AI—and a Small Army of Workers—to Train Robots
item.description: AgiBot is using AI-powered robots to do new manufacturing tasks. Smarter machines may transform physical labor in China.

item.title: Lina Khan to co-chair NYC mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani’s transition team
item.description: Khan's appointment sends a message to the tech industry, whose most powerful players have already been critical of Mamdani, a Democratic socialist.

item.title: Millions to receive free electricity in 2026 thanks to Australia’s solar boom
item.description: Australia now has so much solar power that the government will require utilities to sell customers free electricity for three hours per day.

item.title: Bitcoin Analysts Debate Whether the Crypto Bull Run Is Over or Whether ‘This Time is Different’
item.description: Yesterday, the bitcoin price briefly dipped below the $100,000 mark for the first time since June. Many analysts are wondering if this latest crypto bull market is over.

item.title: You can shop at Shein in Paris—just not online
item.description: On the same day Shein opened its first store in Paris, the French government said Wednesday it will suspend Shein’s website over its alleged online sale of childlike “sex dolls” online until it complies with French law, according to the Associated Press. Fast Company has reached out to Shein for comment. A spokesperson for the company […] On the same day Shein opened its first store in Paris, the French government said Wednesday it will suspend Shein’s website over its alleged online sale of childlike “sex dolls” online until it complies with French law, according to the Associated Press....

item.title: Amazon’s grocery store dreams are reshaping Whole Foods
item.description: Amazon built a portal to Kraft Mac & Cheese, Goldfish crackers, and Nestlé Drumsticks inside one of its Whole Foods stores — and it plans to do the same at others. In a blog post on Wednesday, Amazon details a Whole Foods concept store in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania, where shoppers can order grocery items from […]

item.title: Amazon brade à -33% cet écran incurvé de 34 pouces et 100 Hz lors du pré-Black Friday
item.description: Pour ceux qui souhaitent quitter le petit écran de leur ordinateur portable pour quelque chose de plus grand, découvrez cet écran incurvé PRO MP341CQ de la marque MSI pour 199,90 euros au lieu de 299,99 euros chez Amazon.

item.title: Tinder to use AI to get to know users, tap into their Camera Roll photos
item.description: Tinder is testing an AI feature that learns about you from your Camera Roll photos.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani’s Campaign Figured Out How to Channel Fandom
item.description: Much of the content about Mamdani online hasn’t come from his campaign or the dozens of political influencers invited to cover it. It has also come from fans.

item.title: This typeface is too elegant to ignore
item.description: Porte Neue is the typeface of effortless sophistication, and that’s why the ‘Fast Company’ design team chose it for the latest issue Porte Neue is the typeface of effortless sophistication, and that’s why the ‘Fast Company’ design team chose it for the latest issue

item.title: Woman With Rare Condition Has Armpits That Leak Milk
item.description: Doctors in the Philippines reported an unusual case of ectopic breast tissue in a recent report.

item.title: Want to know what EU officials are up to? Call a data broker
item.description: Reporters have used data brokers to access location and movement information of EU Commissioners.

item.title: On a essayé les Nothing Ear (3) : jusqu’à 45 dB de silence dans un écrin transparent
item.description: Nothing peaufine sa recette avec les Ear (3), une nouvelle génération d’écouteurs transparents qui conjuguent style affirmé et performances. Voici notre prise en main détaillée.

item.title: The First ‘Wonder Man’ Clip Reveals Its Mystery Superpowers
item.description: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and Ben Kingsley star in 2026's first big Marvel Studios project.

item.title: The hottest trend in speedrunning is flipping a coin
item.description: Unfair Flips is a game about flipping a coin. And despite being designed around random chance, it has a vibrant speedrunning community, racing to see who can get to 10 heads the fastest. That's the only goal. You earn money with each heads and can spend that on four things: a more valuable coin, a […]

item.title: How to watch Shetland season 10 — free streams from anywhere in the world
item.description: The drugs operation takes a backseat after the discovery of an elderly woman's body in remote Lunniswick. Here's how to watch Shetland season 10 online.

item.title: A nasty Apple Maps bug is eating up a ridiculous amount of storage on some iPhones – here's how to get rid of it
item.description: Is Maps taking up a ridiculous amount of storage on your iPhone? You're not alone – and there is a (frustrating) solution.

item.title: Baseus’ solar-powered dash cam is down to its best price yet
item.description: If you’ve ever had to leave your car parked for a few days while traveling — or returned to find a new dent that wasn’t there before — Baseus’ PrimeTrip VD1 Pro might be worth checking out. The dash cam records in 4K and keeps watch even when the car’s turned off, and right now, […]

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Just Inherited the NYPD Surveillance State
item.description: In addition to affordability, New York City’s mayor-elect will be forced to reckon with the NYPD’s sweeping mass surveillance operations.

item.title: The newly elected Virginia and New Jersey governors both promised to lower electricity bills. Here’s how
item.description: Governors-elect Mikie Sherrill and Abigail Spanberger made rising utility costs a core focus of their campaigns. Will their plans deliver? Across the country, Americans have seen their electricity bills spike this year. Energy prices have been rising faster than inflation, and are expected to just keep rising.

item.title: This free app gives Android phones AirDrop-style file transfer powers – and it even works with Mac
item.description: LocalSend is a must-have for every Android user – it makes transferring files between Mac and Android phones simple and painless.

item.title: Xiaomi profite du pré-Black Friday pour brader sa nouvelle caméra en 2,5K avec double objectif à moins de 70 €
item.description: La caméra extérieure de Xiaomi est bien équipé pour surveiller tous les endroits hors intérieur de votre logement, elle voit en couleur la nuit, reconnais les humains, les mouvements et les véhicules... Et pour le préquel du Black Friday, elle passe à 69 euros au lieu de 79 sur le site de Xiaomi.

item.title: This exclusive Norton VPN price means you don't have to wait until Black Friday for a great VPN deal
item.description: You can already save on Norton's premium VPN plans, meaning no need to wait around until Black Friday if you want online security and overseas streaming now.

item.title: Google Maps is getting a big Gemini upgrade for drivers – here are 4 new features coming soon
item.description: Google has announced several new Gemini-powered features that are coming to the Google Maps app –here's what they do and when they roll out.

item.title: How to watch Club Brugge vs FC Barcelona: free streams, TV details for Champions League 2025/26 game as Marcus Rashford looks to extend his impressive form
item.description: All the ways to watch Club Brugge vs FC Barcelona in the 2025/26 Champions League as the Catalonians aim for another three points.

item.title: Why your writing practice is failing
item.description: Hint: It’s not about time management. I’ve been writing professionally since 2002, and in that time, I’ve experimented with lots of different strategies to keep myself on track. (I’ve been a columnist at Fortune and Fast Company, and am now a contributing writer for The New York Times Opinion Section, in addition to cohosting Slate’s Money podcast, and I’ve been an editor, reporter, and opinion writer for a number of other places.)...

item.title: Debra Messing’s anti-Mamdani crashout
item.description: ‘Fascinating albeit kinda scary to watch.’ Last night, Zohran Mamdani defeated Andrew Cuomo to become the next mayor of New York City. Cue the online crashouts.
